dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset that pairs high-resolution Sentinel-5P satellite imagery with corresponding surface-level NO2 concentration measurements, characterized by its daily granularity over the course of 15 months.
dcterms:title: Paired Sentinel-5P and NO2 Data

dcterms:creator: Linus Scheibenreif
Michael Mommert
Damian Borth
dcterms:description: A dataset proposed for estimating air pollution with remote sensing data, revealing greenhouse gas emissions from space, characterized by at most monthly granularity.
dcterms:title: Dataset proposed by Scheibenreif et al.
